word:
Elder Starr, the next speaker, referred to some personal phases of Mrs. White's life. "I have never heard any other person," he said, "speak of love for 
                                                                           452
Jesus, as I have heard her speak. Many times have I heard her exclaim, 'I love Him, I love Him, I LOVE Him!' Her entire life was devoted to winning others to love Him and serve Him with all the heart. . . .
